metadata.data_source: 《中华人民共和国铁道行业标准 TB/T 1407.2-202X 列车牵引计算 第2部分：动车组》Railway train traction calculation--Part 2: EMU
metadata.info_chinese: 车型CRH380AL, 编组14M2T, 定员1028人, 最高运行速度350km/h, 紧急制动最大减速度1.35m/s^2, 整车网端容量26985kVA, 最大起动牵引力520.0kN, 轮周功率19929kW, 恒功转折点速度155.0km/h, 电机持续运行速度270.0km/h, 辅助电源容量1040kVA, 定员质量903t.
metadata.info_english: Train type: CRH380AL, 1028 passengers, max speed 350km/h, max deceleration 1.35m/s^2, max net power 26985kVA, max traction force 520.0kN, wheel power 19929kW, constant power turn point speed 155.0km/h, motor running speed 270.0km/h, auxiliary power capacity 1040kVA, passenger load mass 903t.

max traction power.info: The value 19418.1 is derived from the curve table C.19 and figure E.19 in TB/T 1407.2-202X, which is not equal to the value 19929.0 in the table B.1.

max traction constraint formula.formula: F <= k * v + b. F(kN). v(m/s)
F <= a / v + c. F(kN). v(m/s)

max pn braking force.info: 标准文件中，表D.19紧急UB减速度为0.7065m/s^2, pn_brake = 0.7065m/s^2 * 903t = 637.97kN.

max reg braking power.info: This is not limiting braking power, because the braking curve is not strictly limited by power.

max braking constraint formula.formula: F <= k * v + b. F(kN). v(m/s)
F <= a / v + c. F(kN). v(m/s)

tunnel resistance rtn.info: Based on unit resistance w_s = 0.46 c v^2. used as wtn=rtn*v^2.
